headline: Does the Recent Pullback Make D.R. Horton Stock Attractive in 2025?
summary: If you’ve been debating whether to get in, get out, or simply hold your D.R. Horton shares, you’re not alone. This homebuilding giant has kept investors on their toes, especially with the stock dipping 5.4% over the last week, even after posting a healthy 3.0% gain over the last month. Year-to-date, D.R. Horton is up an impressive 22.3% despite a stumble of 11.3% over the past year. If you zoom out further, the returns are significant, with over 140% growth for both the three and five-year...
